This website, the Stanford Encyclopedia of Philosophy, delves into the intricate topic of relations. It covers preliminary distinctions, eliminativism, reductionism, the nature of relations, and more. You can find explanations on how properties and relations differ, with examples like a cat being on top of a mat (property) versus on top of a fence (relation). The site offers in-depth insights and academic resources to better understand these philosophical concepts. It's a great resource for exploring the complexities of relationships between things.
